\"रंगमंच\" यही कलाकार की सही पहचान है|
\"Every passion needs a platform to overcome\"
\t\t\t Kalakaar’s motive is to aspire all those who are interested in Dance, Music and Acting to notify them all updates in the same platform by a single click.

\t\t\tKalakaar was established on 13th Sep 2018, it came into existence by Mr. Santosh Kadlag has materialized their dream by providing a platform for needy and talented students from all over the world. Kalakaar is for those who want to grow their passion in music, Dancing and Acting etc. Are still not finding any connectivity or online sources…
\t\t\t Our purpose is to find your talent from small to big cities. This will be helpful for all students from all age groups who hails from different walks of life !!

To ensure the privacy of all the users our app strive to keep the information shared with us private and confidential. We are not responsible for any post shared on our website. You agree and accept any modification, improvement or change in the app. The app contains third party advertising or content, we are not responsible or do not endorse any product. Hereby you agreed to all the terms and conditions.
